metadata.name: Invoke-Obfuscation STDIN+ Launcher
metadata.comment: Detects Obfuscated use of stdin to execute PowerShell

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND process.cmd_line rlike 'cmd.\{0,5\}\(?:/c|/r\).\+powershell.\+\(?:\\$\\\{?input\\\}?|noexit\).\+\\"')

output.summary: Detects Obfuscated use of stdin to execute PowerShell
